name: ADVentura - Sociedad Secreta - TGS Exclusive
additionalNotes: Their first release was the ADVentura Explorer which was soon followed by the Navigator and the Conqueror. The brand is known for its back story about a seafaring explorer and his journeys of discovering new cigars, and its unique approach to packaging. ADVentura Cigars are flavorful and are handmade in the Dominican Republic.
